pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.1.10: Sp 2.634: _Maṇḍalabaddhaṁ salākabaddhanti idaṁ pana tiṇṇampi chattānaṁ pañjaradassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Tāni hi maṇḍalabaddhāni ceva honti salākabaddhāni ca._ “_Maṇḍalabaddhaṁ salākabaddhan_: this is said for the purpose of showing the frame of the three sunshades. For they are bound at the rim (_maṇḍalabaddha_) and bound at the ribs (_salākabaddha_).”
